title: The Surprising Start To The Never-Ending Pasta Pass
teaser: What happens when you partake of the Olive Garden's Never-Ending Pasta Pass? NPR's Ari Shapiro gets the skinny from Hagana Kim and Thomas Reyes about the all-you-can-eat deal.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
